org.eclipse.scada.configuration.security

Interface ScriptRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Rule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScriptRuleImpl

    public interface ScriptRule
extends Rule
    A representation of the model object 'Script Rule'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Script
    • Callback Script

    See Also:
    SecurityPackage.getScriptRule()
